107b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'jam dbyangs de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa yi/ /bdud rtsi thigs pa lta bu 'di/ /dang po sangs rgyas legs 'ongs pa/ /mtshan brjod man ngag bri bar bya/ /dpal ldan 'bras spungs mchod rten du/ /sna tshogs rgyud
107b5(rgyud 'grel): don gnyer ba yi/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /sa ga'i bco lnga la 'dus so/ /de dus ston pas 'gro don du/ /chos dbyings dag gi dbang phyug gi /dkyil 'khor spros pa 'bras spungs yin/ /de yi phyi dang nad dag tu/ /dpal ldan rgyu skang
107b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor che/ /dang po sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor spros/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad la/ /dbang bskur byin te rgyud sde ba zhi/ /snying po'i rgyud dang lnga po dag /rdo rje 'chang gis rgyas par gsungs/ /snying po'i snying po 'di
107b7(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /bsdus te mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ /rang rang gnas su rgyas gdab bo/ /snying po'i snying po 'di de ni/ /'gro ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling/ /bye ba phrag brgyar klags grub tu/ /rab tu grags so 'di yi don/ /zab cing gting dbag dka' ba ni/ /dus?
108a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang shes ba ma yin te/ /zla ba bzang bos dri med bshad/ /de don rigs ldan rnams la ni/ /bdag gis rab tu dgrol bar bya/ /'di la bcu bzhir gsungs pa yang/ /bcu gsum don ldan sgra yi dbyings/ /gcig? ni kun
108a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsngags pa'o/ /de nyid phyin na 'dir mi 'chad/ /bshad par bya ba bcu gsum ni/ /zhus dang gsung dang gzigs pa dang/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje dbyings/ /chos dbyings me long so so rtog /mnyam nyid bya grub rgyud bsdus pa/ /sngags dang rje su yi
108a3(rgyud 'grel): rang dang/ /bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa/ /de las dang po thog mar ni/ /zhus pa bcu drug bstan par bya/ /'thad pa ston pa chos kyi sku/ /dzA land+hA ra'i tha yig las/ /zhu po tI sha ku ni yi/ /a yig rkyen pas chos kun gyur/ /e baM ya zhes/
108a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /de nyid rdo rje btsun mo yi/ /b+ha ga lar zhugs de nyid do/ /de yang bshad pa/ de nas rdo rje 'chang dpal ldan/ /gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog /'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas dpang/ /gsang dbang rdo rje dbang phyug po zhes pa/ /
108a5(rgyud 'grel): a yi rnam pa bdag med ma/ /rab tu mi gnas stong pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad bral ba'o/ /tha yi rnam pa mi bskyod pa/ /dmigs med snying rje chen po la/ /sna tshogs dngos rnams snang ba'o/ /rdo rje gnyis med sbyor ba dang/ /stong pa snying rje'i
108a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po can/ /zag gsum 'dzag pa med pa'o/ /'chang bzung 'jug de nyid ni/ /lhan cig 'dzin pas 'chang bar brjod/ /de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs btang nas/ /stong par rtse gcig yid byed pa/ /nyi ma
108a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu brtags na yang/ /gal te yid ches ma gyur na/ /de che nga yi brdzun gyi tshig ces pas dam bca' gsungs pa'o/ /rtags gsum dang por bar tham/ /dang po du sogs lnga thob pa/ /gnyis pa stong dang brgyad brgya 'gags/ /tha mar nyi
108b1(rgyud 'grel): khri chig stong dang/ /drug brgya 'gags pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ni de las rang don gzhan/ /dam pa gnyis ni 'byung ba'am/ /yang na gnyis med sbyor ldan bas/ /ril bu bum ba mchil lham dang/ /sa 'og mkha' spyod rkang mgyogs dang/ /gnod sbyin
108b2(rgyud 'grel): mo dang bcud kyi len/ /de la sogs pa dpag med mchog /gdul dka' yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung/ /khyad par rta ba'i tshogs chen po/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dang/ stong dang brgyad brgya sum brgya dang/ /drug cu'i dmag dpung gdul dka' ba'o/ /ci phyir
108b3(rgyud 'grel): nyin mtshan gnod byed phyir/ /'dul ba drug sogs dpag med kyang/ /kun gyis thul bam yin te/ /mchog tu mi 'dzag ye shes che/ /'du byed rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /de ni gang las rnyed ce na/ /bum pa gtum mo lhan cig skyes/ /yan lag drug
108b4(rgyud 'grel): gis lus bcings pa'o/ /de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /byed pa bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa gsum po yang 'grub par gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sgo gsum bo/ /rgyal ba rang lus bde stong rgyas/ /khro rgyu can las thag bsrings
108b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /gsang pa gsang ba lnga yin te/ /de yang rdo rje theg pa las/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bar bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig ni smra ba yin/ /myos par gyur pa'i khu ba btung/ /de ltar spyad na
108b6(rgyud 'grel): blol? bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa rlung ni srog yin la/ /de 'gog byed pa srog chags gsod/ /gzhan gyi bud med rang lus mdzes/ /rang gis grub pa rnam par dag /ma phyin hi las thig le len/ /sems can thams cang bsgral lo zhes/ /brdzun gyi tshig ni
108b7(rgyud 'grel): smra ba yin/ /bde ba phyag rgya'i khu ba ni/ /rtag tu btung bar bya ba yin/ /de lta min par dngos spyod pa/ /rdo rje dmyal bar nges par 'tshed/ /dgongs pa'i skad kyis bstan pa yin/ /dbang po dbang po lnga yin te/ /dad pa dran pa brtson 'grus dang/ /bsam gtan
109a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje theg pa'i lam bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje gsar? ldan dbang lnga ldan/ /de nyid phyir na de dbang phyug /rnam par rgyas pa rdo rje'i lus/ mi yi 'gro ba mchog yin no/ /pad+ma rtsa la dkar po ni/ thig len nam mkha' i khams
109a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /sbyan ni gsal bar snang ba ste/ /rtags dang ye shes nor bu brtan/ /sna tshogs padmo rtsa yo dbyibs/ /gdan la bzhugs ni skye mched dag /rang gi lag ni ro rkyang gnyis/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni gnyis med ma/ /rnam grangs mang la rten nas ni/ /
109a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gsor bar brtson 'grus gnyen po yis/ /yang dang yang du byad ces pa/ /nyams su myong bar byed pa'o/ /khro gnyer dpral ba'i thig le la/ /rim par ldan sogs bcu drug phyed/ /nyams su myong bas ye shes 'phel/ /lag na
109a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnyen ye shes/ /thabs chen mdza' yas rnyed pa yis/ /nyon mongs rnam dag gdul dka' 'dul/ /de 'dul dpa' bo rnams kyi ni/ /phrin las gcig go zhes brjod pa'o/ /dpa' bo de 'joms phyir na dpa' /
109a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba'i nyan rang sogs/ /'dod yon spyod la skrag pa'o/ /gzugs ni gnod sbyin des mi thub/ /mi thung byis ba'i lus 'chang ba/ /zhe sdang mi spyod rdo rje nyid/ /ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje lus la rtse mo ni/ /spyi bo'i hi dang bum pa'i a/ /rab bslob?
109a6(rgyud 'grel): ni yan mar gshegs/ /rang gi lag ni yan lag drug /gsor byed pa ni srog rtsol sogs/ gong nas gong du goms byed pa'o/ /de yang dgos pa ca'i phyir na/ /snying rje'i don gyi byang chub sems/ /de yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /ji srid sems can
109a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnas su/ /gnas par gyur pa'i bar dag tu/ /dpal mchog mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin/ /de phyir sems dpa' don pa ni/ /sred pa'i zhags pas rtag mi 'jigs/ /srid bde smon pa dgag pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu
109b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags rab myos pas/ /rtog pa rgyas pas smin par mdzad/ /ces gsungs so/ /de lta'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che/ /shes rab mi rtog chos kyi dbyings/ /yang na las dang ye shes gnyis/ /las ni bcos ma ye shes mchog /de lta'i 'thad pa 'di nyi de
109b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa'am/ /so sor bsdu dang lha yi yum/ /de la brten nas rtogs pa'o/ /dga' dad bde ba'i ye shes nyid/ /bgub mi ngoms spangs pa'o/ /rangs pa de yi lus sems chim
109b3(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms can ni thar pa 'dod/ /'khor ba spang sogs gnyis rtog med/ /khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa/ /zhes pa stong pa khro bo la/ /chags bral ye shes ltan skyes gzugs/ /de yang sangs rgyas thod pa las/ /dngos po thad skyes bar byed/ /stong bas gshig
109b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed ngas ti lphi? phyir drag po phro bo'i gzugs/ /slu ba'i ri dags rnams par spangs/ /rang bzhin stong pa'i nam mkha' ni/ /dgod cing 'dzig pa ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi bde ba la/ /brin las bdebs spra byed pa'o/ /don na rnal 'byor
109b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug sogs/ /lus btud nas ni mnyams pa/ /lhan cig rdzags pa yang dag rdzags/ /'dud ces pa ni hi la'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni yas byon pa/ /bde bas rtog pa 'joms pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mas log pa'o/ /de nyid gnas su
109b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'o/ /rdzogs pa dud khang rdzogs pa la/ /sangs rgyas spang bya spangs thob par/ /phyag 'tshal zhes pa de la 'dud/ /thal mo rtsa dang rlung gnyis la/ /sbyar byas thig le 'phor mi ster/ /sbyan sngar rdo rje bum pa'i nang/ /'dug ste 'od 'phro thig
109b7(rgyud 'grel): le la/ /'di skad gsol mi sta zhing snyems stengs rje de dbyad/ /khyab bdag 'phel sdug thig le la/ /bdag la sman pa mchog bde dang/ /dkar po'i byogs la lus bde ba'o/ /gzhan don bde ba chen po la/ /rjes su slob par 'dod pa'i rten/ /thugs rtsa bas ni
110a1(rgyud 'grel): rang lus kyi/ /byang chub sems ni ma 'phros par/ /rtag hu ma nyams ldan phyir ro/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas dga' bcu drug /mngon rdzogs dga' ba rnams thim pa'o/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /rnyed pa'i mi 'gyur ye shes te/
110a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin chos dbyings rnam dag pa/ /de ni mngon sum thob par mdzod/ /nyin mongs pas ni thig le nyams/ /'khor ba rgyas par byas pa yi/ /sems 'khrul bas ni de sdug bsngal/ /sna tshogs rgyas par byas pa'o/ /mi shes ma rig bag chags stobs/ /
110a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dam du bying ba rgal dka' ba/ /de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las/ /mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang/ /khengs pa la ni rtag tu dga' / /rtag tu gdug sems ldan kun gyis/ /gsang ba'i spyod yul 'di mi shes/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sems can kun la nyi khri
110a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /tshig stong drug brgya lags pas na/ /sman pa bde tshan dbyer med pa'o/ /bla med 'bras bu ltan sgyes bde/ /de thob bya phyir dga' bzhi bsgom/ /rab tu gsal ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /zhes pa rab gsal rang gzhan la/ /chos dang gzugs su gsal
110a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /bcom ldan zag med ye shes la/ /ston pa thig le bde chen po/ /'byung gnas spyi po'i haM yig la/ /'gro ba'i rlung gi las rnams so/ /bla ma thabs mchog me rlung sbor/ /gnyis med 'dres pa bde ba che/ /dam tshig
110a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i thig le bzhi/ /de nyid mkhyen pa ye shes so/ /dbang po bsam pa sgo lnga yi/ /yul dang yul can snang ba'o/ /so sor sdud bas rtags thob pa/ mkhyen mchog ces ni de la bya/ /bcom ldan 'das na rtogs pa'i don/ /ye shes sku ni bzhi pa'i sku/ /nyams
110a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi pa'i sku ma yin/ /gtsug tor bde chen dpral ba'i taM/ /chen po e yi rnam pa can/ /baM las kA li'i phreng ba la/ /tshig gi bdag po zhes bshad do/ /ye shes gtsug tor thig le che/ /rang 'byung ba ni rgyu ni ltos/ /byas pa med cing rnam par spangs
110b1(rgyud 'grel): ngar? nyid kyis rigs bsod nams mchog /dA ri ka pa'i zhal snga nas/ /skye ba med pa'i ye shes 'di/ /rdul med nam mkha' i dkyil lta bu/ /lus gnas bde bas rgyas pa las/ /dA ri ka pas da lta rnyed/ /ces gsungs so/ /'jam dpal nor rtse'i thig le la/ /ye shes
110b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med bde ba'i rten/ /sems dpa' ling ga rgyas pa'o/ /ming ni bde chen lhan skyes te/ /yang dag brjod pa'i rgyud mang las/ /mchog gi bsgrub bya dam par gsungs/ /don zab rtogs dka' mi 'gyur te/ /rdo rje theg pa'i bsgrub bya 'ang/ /de'o/ /
110b3(rgyud 'grel): don ni rgya chen zhing zhes pa/ /lhan skyes dngos rnams khyab pa'o/ /don chen mtshungs med bzhi pa yi/ /dbang gis thob pa'i cig shos des/ /rang bzhi ba nor phyag rgya che/ /nyan rang rnams ni skrag 'gyur ba'i/ /thog ma dga' bas dpa' pa ste/ /bar dang mchog
110b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' tha mar ni/ /dga' bral dge ba lhan cig skyes/ /'das pa thos pa'i dus dag tu/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsungs pa ni/ bla mas gsungs pa thos nyams myong/ ma 'ongs sgom pa'i dus dag tu/ /rnam yang gsungs 'gyur la ba pa/ sgom pa nyams su myong ba'o/ /da ltar
110b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsam pas de don rtogs pa'o/ /yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang/ /rdo rje theg pa nyams su myong/ /rang la rang gis bstan pa'o/ /rgyud chen bde chen rgyud chags pa/ /spas pa de pon nyid do/ /rgyu 'phrul mngon par rtogs
110b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /dra brtsa dang thig ler 'brel/ /rdo rje 'chang chen ye shes sku/ gsang sngags 'dzin ni bde chen gyi/ /ye shes lnga pa gsal bar 'dzin/ /dpag med rnams ni lam bye brag /bka' bzhin du ni kun du 'od/ /ma mthong dang du rlung 'gog mchog /glur
110b7(rgyud 'grel): blangs gang lags bshad du gsol/ /zhes ni glu yi yid tshim byed/ /de ltar rang nyid rtogs shid bde/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas ykun ni/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur ye shes la/ /thig la bzhi ba'i mdza' ca no/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang/ /
111a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i yan lag drug yin no/ /'dzin pa thig le 'dzin pa ste/ /dga' bzhi ye shes rgyas par byas/ /nges par 'byung ni haM las skyes/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du ni/ /rab tu gsal bar sems can la/ /ji ltar bar ni
111a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya/ /bdag gis rlung gnyis sbyor pa yis/ /bsam pa brtan pos thig le gzung/ /de las phyag rgya chen po thob/ /nyon mongs nyams pa'i sdug bsngal la/ /ma lus bsal ba gcod pa dang/ /mi shes rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs/ /ma lus sbang phyir
111a3(rgyud 'grel): dngos po bstan/ /bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du/ /nyon mongs byang chub yan lag lam/ /de yang sangs rgyas thod pa las/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med pas/ /de bas 'dod la nan tan du/ /bu khyed kyis ni
111a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gyis/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sems can thig ler gnas pa'o/ /de yang saM pu Ta las/ /'di la bsal ba ci yang med/ /bsnan par bya ba cung zad med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/ /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol/ /zhes gsungs so/ rnams
111a5(rgyud 'grel): la bshad par 'tshal bar ston/ /gsang dbang nor bu'i yan lag na/ /rdo rje yis ni mi bskyod pa/ /de skad e baM thabs shes rab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gyen gshegs pa'o/ /bde chen sems la gsol mdzad nas/ /thabs shes thal
111a6(rgyud 'grel): mo sbyar byas te/ /lus btud skar ma'i sbyor ba las/ /spyan sngar 'dug ni rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar d+hU tI la brten nas/ /dga' ba bcu drug rnam dag pas/ /zhus pa'i tshigs bcad bcu drug dag /zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
111a7(rgyud 'grel): le'u gnyis pa slar gsungs pa/ /byes pa'i skye bo gdul slad du/ /ston pa la sogs mi 'ga' la/ /'dir chen po'i don bshad pa/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thug ces ba shAkya thub pa ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang che/ /a ra li las zas gtsang thabs/ /sgyu ma chen mo shes
111b1(rgyud 'grel): rab la/ /don grub rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /mchog tu dga' ba bde ba che/ /bcom ldan 'das ni phyag rgya che/ /rdzogs pa gtsug tor thig le rdzogs /sangs rgyas 'khor drug dag ye shes/ /rkang gnyis mchog ni bden pa gnyis/ /yang na gtsug tor nor bu gnyis
111b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi zhal nas ltags bzang ba/ /zhes pa yin ni don bshad pa/ /'jig rten kun tu khyab pa yi/ /ye shes skyes pas ye shes kyi/ /d+hU tI mthong rtags mthar thug pa/ /re khA nag po phra ba'i phra/ /longs sku 'phro ba mthong ba'o/ /de yang dang po sangs rgyas las/ /
111b3(rgyud 'grel): du ba smig rgyu krin bu me/ /zhes brtags bcu bstan pa'o/ /ring zhing rnam par rtog pa las/ /mtshan brtags thob pas blo yangs pa/ /nyin mtshan rab tu brgyad mdzad de/ /de yang 'khor lo sngom pa las/ /gang che goms pa brtan gyur pa/ /gsal snang dngos su mthong
111b4(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /lce rtser phyin pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /ji srid 'dod pa de srid du/ /lce 'phel bar ni 'gyur ba yis/ /de tshe khams gsum po yang blta/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum po lus ngag yid/ /snang byed cing ni rtsa gsum nyid/ /
111b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud bzhi du ?? nyon 'chi lta bu/ /dgra rnams bdud sogs nyon mongs rnams/ /'dul byed bde rlung thig le khams /ma thul sems can rnams kyi lam/ /'og ltas rtsa gsum ngan song gsum/ /brag pa rgyas pas 'khor bar 'khor/ /des na mi 'jag
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsum/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i lhan cig skyes/ /'dzum bstan nas ni dga' ba bzhi/ /tshangs pa dbu ma'i lam yin te/ /gsung ni gyen rgyu'i lam yin te/ /snyed pa bde rlung sril sgra 'byung/ /'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas/ /zhes pa bcu drug rtsa
111b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pas/ /sgo gsum lhan skyes khyab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje bsam gtan la/ /stobs po che ni lhan skyes bde/ /rim gyis byon pas dga' bzhi rgyas/ /gsang dbang rdo rje nor bu la/ /slar gsungs pa ni mthar thug nas/ /slar la gnas su gshegs
112a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /snying? rje che dang ldan gyur pas/ /zhes pa thams cad bde chen khyab/ /rang snang bzhin du bzhin snang ba'i 'gro la rnam par rtog pa'i rlung/ /phan ba'i don du 'gog par byed/ /yum lngas longs spyod ldan pa khyod/ /ye shes lus
112a2(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje'i lus/ /'jam dpal thig le'i khams yin te/ /ming brjod dga' ba skad cig ma/ /don chen rtog pad bde ba che/ /dag bar byed pa rtog spros bral/ /bcing grol thams cad de bzhin nyid/ /sdig yul lngas ther bar byad/ sel ba ni srog gcod sogs/ /rtsa
112a3(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi dag gos pa med/ /til+lo pa yi zhal nas kyang/ /ri rab gser gyi logs la gang gnas pa/ /gang gi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang/ /de bzhin skye med rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin bor nas phyag rgya che/ /zhes gsungs so/ /da
112a4(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog mi 'gyur ye shes/ /nyan par brtson pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid do/ /legs so nyon mongs ye shes rtogs/ /lag na rdo rje sbyor grub la/ /khyod legs so ni bsgom pa'o/ /gsang ba ta ga nor bu'i gnas/ /bdag po lte bar bde ba 'dzin
112a5(rgyud 'grel): lhan gcig skyes ba nyams su myong/ /de phyir gsum ba'i dus su ni/ /da yis khyod la rab tu bstan/ /khyod ni rtog med rtse gcig pas/ /yid kyi nyon la bsgom par gyis/ /bcom ldan b+ha ga btsun mo'i gnas /de ni skyon nub pas legs zhes/ /de yang
112a6(rgyud 'grel): te yi rdo rje las/ /shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/ /gzugs ngang lang tshes rnam par spras/ /rang gi dbang bskur snying rje che/ /rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer la/ /spyod pa byed par rtogs par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gyen la gshegs pa gsol ba'o/ /gtsug tor
112a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po la sogs pa'i/ /'khor lo drug rtsa'i rnam dag bas /slar gsungs shlo drug tu dag/ slar gsungs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //rigs drug la gzigs le'u ni/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /ces pas bcom ldan
112b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba la/ /shAkya stong pa chen po nyid/ /thub pa nor bu mi 'da' ba' o/ /gang gis gzigs na de yis gzigs/ /gang la gzigs na rigs drug la/ /ji ltar gzigs na 'khor lo drug /sangs rgyas drug tu gzigs pa'o/ /gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad ni
112b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ?? ?? ltar khyab pa yi/ /'od gsal ba ni byang chub sems/ /nor bu'i kha nas mi 'pho ba/ /mi bskyod rdo rje lhan skyes dga' / /badzre d+h+rika ste 'jig pa med/ /gsang sngags lte rtsa yi ge'i gzugs/ /rig sngags dkyil 'khor 'khir lo 'phro/ /'chang ba'i
112b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ni pha yin te/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo ji na dzig /rnam par snang mjad? chen po'o/ /rigs gsum rdul mun snying stobs te/ /rnam par gzigs ni mtshan nyid med /dang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'od dpag med pa a ro li ka/ 'jig rten lte
112b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /'jig rten 'das pa snying gnyid/ /rigs ni rin chen 'byung ldan la/ /mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rin 'byung nyid/ /rata na d+h+rika ste gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten zhu ba'i khu ba la/ /snang byed bde chen snang ba'o/ /rig chen don grub ye shes sku/ /
112b5(rgyud 'grel): haM las 'bab pa'i phrin las byed/ /stong pas brgyan pas pradz+nyA d+h+reka/ /phyag rgya chen po rdo rje sems/ /rig mchog rigs bsdus bde chen grol/ /thig le bcu drug yongs rdzogs ba/ /bco lnga'i mdza' can rnam par dag/ de nyid gtsug tor chen po dang/ rin po chen yang
112b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid do/ /chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba/ /de la ston bas char gzigs pa'o/ /gnas dang phung po dga' ba dang/ /las dang lha dang ye shes dang/ /drug ldan de la gzigs pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis/ /shOka gnyis dag pa'o/ /rigs drug la
112b7(rgyud 'grel): gzigs pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u gsum pa'o/ //de nas sgru 'phrul dra ba ni/ /mngon par byang chub le'u la/ /chig gi bdag po sangs rgyas kyis/ /tshigs su bcad pa shloka/ rtsa yi dra ba ji snyed pa/ /bsdus pas 'khor lo drug tu bsdus/ /de nyid
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rgyal po drug /ldan zhing badzra d+h+rika sna tshogs/ /'khor lo drug la ldan pa'o/ /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang/ /zhes ba kun rdzob don dam la/ /kur rdzob kun brtags gzhan dbang gnyis/ /don dam yongs su grub pa ste/ /
113a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa bden pa dbyer med la/ /'byung ba sku gsum 'byung ba'o/ /yang na mdza' bzhi bral ba yi/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /nang du gnyis ni ro rkyang gnyis/ /de ni rtag chad mdza' yin pas/ /med pa kun 'dar ma nyid do/ /ma skyes rang bzhin ro gcig
113a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'byung ba bde chen mchog mi 'gyur/ /de nyid mi skye chos can no/ /'di gsungs pa ni bsam brjod med/ /a A i a'i u A e i o aau aM a(rgyud 'grel): /zhes pa 'di yi don bshad na/ /ma ning bzhin ma bshad pa/ /skye med ston pa'i rgyud yin
113a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /yi ge bcu gnyis bstan pa ni/ /sa bcu gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni/ /tshan do nye ba'i tshan do dang/ /'dus nye ba'i 'du sa dang 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod dang/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /thung du drug ni dang po la/ /ring ba drug na nyi ba'o/ /'khor yo drug la 'jug pa dang/ /gnas la longs spyod thim pa dang/ /bzhi bzhis rlung 'gags mchog thob bo/ /'o na thob lam sa de gang/ /zhi na a sogs bcu gnyis na/ /kun tu 'od dang bdud
113a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi 'od/? /nam mkha' 'od dang rdo rje 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /me rtog 'od dang dpe med 'od/ /bla med 'od dang/ shes rab 'od/ /kun mkhyen dang ni so sor rig /dang po'i thung gsum sgo gsum dga' / /dang po ring gsum mchog tu dga' / /gnyis
113a7(rgyud 'grel): ba thung gsum dga' bral la/ /ring gsum lhan cig skyes dga' o/ /dga' bzhi'i rang bzhin pha rol phyin/ /ma skyes pa'i don bshad pa'o/ /de la skye ba'i rnam 'phrul ni/ /sE to h+ri di thig le la/ dzA na nU rt+ti bde chen te/ /ra haM bud d+ho spangs rtogs ldan
113b1(rgyud 'grel): ?? nI ni d+hA ??/ /tya? ?? ?? ?? ni rlung gsum sgom/ /oM badzra tUk+Sha? zhes pa ni/ /nor bu mi bskyod rlung gcod pa'o/ /du kha(rgyud 'grel): srid pats+tshe da ni/ /lte ba'i nang gnas rnam snang mdzad/ /pradz+nya shes rab 'od dpag med/ /dz+nyAn mUr t+ta ye snying ga /dzA? na kA ya den grub ste/ /dpral
113b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas pa thig le'i khams /bA gI shwa rA rin chen 'byung/ /mgrin par chos kyi phung po gnas/ /a ra pa tsa nA rdor sems/ /gtsug tor gnas pa bcom ldan 'das/ /ya ta na ma(rgyud 'grel): de phyag 'tshal/ /yang na a ra pa tsa na/ /zhes pa'i yi ge'i don bshad na
113b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ye shes rtogs pa yis/ /'dod chags la sogs sman chen bsten/ /mi 'chi lnga spyad dngos grub thob/ /gsang spyod rigs spyod kun tu bzang/ /rnal 'byor rig pas spyad par bya/ /in+d+ra btU ti'i gsung dag yin/ /de ltar tshigs bcad gsum pa des/? /
113b4(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa'o/ /sngags kyi rgya cher 'bral pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o/ //le'u lnga pa rdo rje dbyings/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa ni/ /phung khams dag pa chos kyi dbyings/ /'di ltar phyag rgya chen po la/ /sangs rgyas bcom
113b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ying ga /rtag tu rgyas bde kun tu bzang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor rgyas pa'o/ /a las 'byung ni shes rab phyin/ /'od gsal phyag rgya chen mo la/ /gzugs brnyan snang ba mA ma kI/ /i ni yig 'bru gun gyi mchog/ ma ning rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin
113b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung 'gog bzlas pa mchog sgol ma/ /don chen yi ge yon tan la/ /dam pa thams cad steng bar byed/ /khong nas 'byung ba gtum me'i me/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /lte bar gtum ma spar pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spun sogs yang ni
113b7(rgyud 'grel): bsregs byas nas/ /haM las ri bong can 'dzag go /zhes gsungs so/ /srog chen rdzogs byed gos dkar mo/ /tshig tu brjod pa nyams pa'i mdza' / /spangs pa bde chen brtan spyan ma/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ bde stong dbyer med ye shes/ /tshig ?? rtsa
114a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung yi ge'i gzugs/ /gtum mos klags pas bde stong gsal/ /de nyid rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /nyams su myong ba mchod pa ste/ /phyi rol rdzas rnams rgya chen phul/ /dam pa gsum gyis bsngo byas nas/ /'di phyi'i yon tan rjes 'brangs
114a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /thar pa'i rgyur gyur shin tu dka' / /thar ba'i rtsi smos khams gong ma'i/ /rgyur gyur pa yang ting 'dzin na/ /de byed rnam par g.yengs phyir ro/ /des na mchod chen ma yin no/ /bdud rtsi bsten sogs 'dod yon spyod/ /de yang brgyad pa'i rgyu min pas/ /mchog
114a3(rgyud 'grel): ?? ma yin mchod chen ni/ /dug lnga'i de nyid rtogs pa de'i/ /gsum pa'i ye shes gcig pu yin/ /chen po'i shes rab ye shes so/ /'dod chags gsuM dus ye shes che/ /sems can las can skal bzangs la/ /sgom gsum dpag med dga' bar
114a4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /mchad pa chen po gong bzhin la/ /zhe sdang che ni rlung 'gog pa'o/ /des ni bde g.yos rtog med pas/ /spang bya nyon mongs kun gyi sgra/ /che ba 'di las mi bskyod pa'o/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /srog rtsol dnya tI'i lam zhugs pas/ /gti
114a5(rgyud 'grel): mug blo ni shes rab la/ /gti mug sel ba snang mdzad pa'o/ /mchod pa chen po gong dang mtshungs/ /khro ba chen po nyams pa 'joms/ /yang na dga' bral ye shes la/ /khro ba chen po lhan cig skyes/ /drag po chen po don grub po/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod pa che
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bas sems bsdus mi rtog rgyas/ /de yis 'dod pa thams cad nyid/ /sel bar byed phyir rin po che/ /chags pa nyid na chags pa med/ /'dod sogs lnga po dbyer med pa/ /drug pa rdor 'chang dus 'khor lo/ /'dod pa chen po lus bde ba/ /bde ba chen po
114a7(rgyud 'grel): ngag bde ba/ /dga' ba chen po sems bde ba/ /mgu ba che ni ye shes bde/ /de yang ma log gnyid song dang/ /rmi lam rmi lam chen po dang/ /de nyid sprul longs chos bde chen chen/ /dga' ba dga' bzhir nyams su myong/ /gzungs che thig les ling ga rgyas/ /
114b1(rgyud 'grel): lus? ?? 'od gsal che bste/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku yul rgyas pa'o/ /de ni lus kyi dga' ba mchog/ kha dog che zhing yon tan rgyas/ /lus bor che bad+hU tI rgyas/ /de ni dag gi mchog dka' / /ming yang che zhing mchog gsang theg /rgya che nges khyab bde sems dka' /
114b2(rgyud 'grel): ?? ni bde ba snying po la/ /'khor ni rtse thig rlung gis bskor/ /chen pa'i chos nyid yangs pa yin/ /sgyu ma lta bur shar ba'o/ /de ni ye shes mchog dga' o/ /de ni longs sku'i dga' bzhi'o/ /shes rab mtshon chen stong pa nyid/ /'chang ba dngos rnams 'joms pa ste/ /
114b3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs chen po las rgya yi/ /pad+ma la brten skyas pa yi/ /bde myong lus kyi dga' bral dga' / /lugs? kyu'i mchog ni ye shes kyi/ /'dod pas 'khrig chags bzhi bde ba/ /de ni dag gi dga' bral dga' / /grags chen me rlung sgra yin la/ /snyan grags gsal snang ye
114b4(rgyud 'grel): shes te/ /sems kyi dga' bral dga' ba'o/ /snang ba chen po rdo rje thabs/ /gsal ba chen po shes rab yum/ /gnyis med sbyong bas bde rgyas pa/ /ye shes dga' bral dga' ba'o/ /mkhas pa bde stong thabs la mkhas/ /sgyu 'phrul snang stong chen po 'chang/ /de
114b5(rgyud 'grel): ni lus kyi lhan skyes dga' / /sgyu 'phrul chen po phyag rgya bzhi/ /grub pa med pas don grub pa'o/ /dag gi lhan cig skyes dga' ba'o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po b+ha ga la/ /dga' bas dga' ni ags gang zhe na han skyes dga' o/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po
114b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa 'khor lo/ /mig 'phrul can ni zhan pa'o/ /de ni ye shes lhan skye dga' / /gtsug tor rdo rje nor bu'i bar/ /dga' gsum dga' ba bcu gnyis las/ /mas yar dga' ba dga' bzhi ste/ /gnyis mnyam gnyis gnas dbus dgan/ /bde dang mi
114b7(rgyud 'grel): rtog mtshan dang bral/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i yul tsan la/ /dga' bral rtog zhes brjod dogs gsung/ /dga' ba rnam pa bcu drug go /rgyas par bshad pa dri med ltos/ /sbyin bdag chen po phyi nang gtod/ /gtso bo sgeg mos lhan skyes ster/ /'jig rten sbyin las
115a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'phags/ /tshul khrims chen po byang chub sems/ /'chang ba mi nyams nor bu yis/ /rtse mor phreng ba ma nyams mchog /bzod chen bde bas sems bsdus blus/ /'chad ba mi 'phro brtan pa'o/ /brtson 'grus chen
115a2(rgyud 'grel): po g.yas g.yon rlung/ /d+hU tIng brtul ba 'phar g.yo gar/ /bsam gtan chen po bde stong la/ /ting 'dzin me tog rtsa gcig blta/ /shes rab chen po stong pa nyid/ /lus ni ma rig mun pa'i dngos/ /'chad ba gnyen po'i mar me 'dzin/ /
115a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che ni rlung grub pa/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdug spos can/ /thabs che ba ni bde 'phel bas/ /lus rnams kun la khyab par byug /smon lam khu ba mnyam za bas/ /chos rnams dpe brgyad sa spyod dam/ /ye shes me rlung rgya mtsho ni/ /
115a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bin du dung gnas pa ste/ /mkha' spyod rnam par dag pa'o/ /byams chen shes bya bde bar shar/ /rang bzhin spros bral dpag med rtogs/ /snying rje chen po chags bcas la/ /blo yi mchog ni bde stong myong/ /shes rab chen po gang du yang/ /
115a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med pa phyag rgya che/ /blo chen ldan ni dga' bzhi'o/ /mkhas pa chen po zhes pa ni/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /sems dpa' reg pa chags pa rgyas/ /shin tu chags chen 'dar ba dang/ g.yo dang 'khrug? dang yid 'khrug dang/ /myos dang rgyal
115a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bcu ru 'dod/ /de nyid nang du sbyar ba yis/ /so sor bsdu ba'i mtshan ma bcu/ /thabs chen yul ni nyi shu bzhir/ /bde bas khyab pa dpa' bo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan/ /zhes pa rlung rnams 'chun pa'o/ /
115a7(rgyud 'grel): shugs chen byang sems mi nyams pa/ /mgyogs pa chen po rtsa kun khyab/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /bde bas bdag gzhan bskul nus pa'o/ /stobs chen mtshams med lnga sogs las/ /pha
115b1(rgyud 'grel): rol gnon pa des mi gos/ /de yang rdo rje theg pa las/ /gdol ba smig ma mkhan la sogs/ /mtshams med lnga sogs byed pa'i mis/ /gsod pa don du gnyer bas kyang/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes pa'o/ /srid pa'i ri bo 'jig tshogs kyi/ /
115b2(rgyud 'grel): ?? drug cu rtsa gnyis so/ /chen po gzhig par dka' ba'o/ /'dzams ni bde chen spros bral lo/ /bde chen thob rtags gang zhe na/ /mkhregs shing nor bu'i rtsa gnas la/ /rdo rje chen po ling ga rgyas/ /'chad ba rdo rje 'jigs byed do/ /de nyid drag po chen
115b3(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /drag shul chen po drug gsum 'thoms/ /'jigs chen rtag pa 'jigs par byed/ /'jigs par byed pa chang pa 'joms/ /mgon po rigs mchog phyag rgya che/ /chen po de la lhag med pa'o/ /bla ma bde ba chen po la gsang sngags bde ba'i
115b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bsrung/ /che ba'i mchog ni thabs mchog go/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /ces pa thabs 'dis 'jig rten 'di/ /'dir 'degs pas na tshul la gnas/ /des na theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul ni he ru bdag med na/ /mchog
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje pad+ma sbyor/ /gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying/ /lte ba gsang ba nor bu rtse/ /'gro dang byon pa bcu bzhi yis/ /tshigs bcad bcu bzhi rnam par dag /rdo rje'i lus nyid rdo rje dbyings/ /gnas bdun byon gshegs bde myong ba /lha'o
115b6(rgyud 'grel): des na dkyil 'khor te/ /brgyad brgya bcu gnyis bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //le'u drug pa chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor ni/ /sangs rgyas bde chen gsol bar
115b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /rnam par snang mdzad 'od gsal che/ /thub pa chen po mi nyams bde/ /thub chen ldan pa sgom gsum rgyas/ /gsang sngags chul chen bde stong la/ /de las byung ba 'dong yon lam/ /gsangs sngags tshul chen dbang bzhi la/ /rig pa bzhi yi bdag
116a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid can/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ /ces pa bum dbang rdzas bcu ste/ /gsum pa rdzas gsum ster sbyin pa/ /gnyis sbyor byang sems brtan 'dzin pa/ /tshul khrims rtog bral bzod pa'o/ /brtson 'grus ba thag tsam mi 'jig/
116a2(rgyud 'grel): bde stong mi g.yo bsam gtan no/ /shes rab lha mo'i phyag rgya las/ /bla ma'i zhal las rnyang? pa'o/ /thabs ni gong gi ma rtogs na/ /ka ra na bcu la brten nas/ /'gog dang bzlog dang khyab sogs thabs/ /de yang sdom pa rgya mtsho las/ /kun tu tsum
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bcu tu li/ /na khas rtse dang rdan das rtse/ /yang dag sbyor dang sid ces smra/ /nyed cing skyes pa ltar byed pa/ /brgyad la brgyad brgyad dbye ba yis/ /byed pa drug cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /smon lam bde chen mi 'bral ba/ /stobs ni zlog
116a4(rgyud 'grel): dgal zlo ga pa'o/ /ye shes lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /phyin bcu thob pas dbang rdzogs pa'o/ /de yang kampa'i zhal snga nas/ /dur khrod chen po'i dgon par rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /gser snod dag tu seng ge'i zho ldugs tshe na phan tshun du/ /dngul ba
116a5(rgyud 'grel): sel dang bsil ba thob pas dang po dang po gnyis/ /rjes chags khro med le lo med pas gnyis pas gsum dang bzhi/ /rtse gcig rtog bral gsum pas lnga pa drug pa de bzhin gzhan/ /'gog len khyab byed gnas pa 'khrul 'khor rlung thabs stobs/ /
116a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bcu gnyis smon 'debs de bzhin nyid/ /bde dang cig shos dbyer med gnas pa bzhi ni bzhi pa ste/ /bla ma dam pa'i drin gyis bdag la 'di 'dra gsal bar snang zhes gsungs so/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /zhes pa
116a7(rgyud 'grel): khams bcu 'joms pa ste/ /rlung dang sems dang byang chub sems/ /khrag dang rkang dang rgyus pa dang/ /rus pa sha dang dbang po dang/ /pags pa la sogs bcu po de/ /bde bas khyab brtan gnas pa'o/ /de nyid gnas dang dag par 'dod/ /pa
116b1(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/ /zhes pa yul dang yul can dag /pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/ /ces pa ka ra na bcu yis/ /bde stong skyes pa tshul chen no/ /mgon po bde chen he ru ka/ sa bcu gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /dbang phyug mi 'dzag dga' ye shes
116b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bcu la ni gnas pa'o/ /zhes pa ka ran bcu la/ /sbyin sogs re res brgyan pa'o/ /shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa lta stangs shes pa las/ /rnam dag thob rtags rnam pa bcu/ /du ba smig rgya srin bu ma/ /'bar ba zla sngon mkha' 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): dag dang/ thig le re khA nag po'o/ /bdag nyid can ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /longs sku mthong ba yin par 'dod/ /shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba'o/ /zhes pa bud med nam mkha' dag /bltas te dbang po yul yul can/ /gcig tu gyur pa mthong ba ni/ /
116b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba lan lag drug yin te/ /rtags rtogs ldan pa 'chang ba yin/ /dpal ldan dang po sangs rgyas las/ /nam mkhar sems gtad mig mi 'dzum/ /rdo rje lam zhugs rtags bcu mthong/ /zhes so/ /rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/ /zhes pa rnam
116b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gong rtags la/ /sha la sogs pa spyan lnga yis/ /yul dang yul can mthong ba'o/ /thub dbang stobs bcu zhes pa ni/ /gyen thur med khyab srog dang ni/ /glu dang rus rtsangs nor lha sbyin/ /khyab pa'i bdag nyid bde stong ngo/ /kun gyi nyi khri chig
116b6(rgyud 'grel): stong la/ /don ni 'gog cing ma lus byed/ /rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /me dang zla ba nyi ma dang/ /thig le nag po thig le che/ /sangs rgyas longs sku mthong ba'o/ /de yid dang pos snags rgyas las/ /tshe las yo byad skye dang chos/ /rdza 'phrul mos smon
116b7(rgyud 'grel): sems ye shes so/ /rtags bcu'i grub pa dbang bcu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /thog ma med pas dga' ba la/ /spros med bdag ni mchog dga' o/ /de bzhin nyid ni lhag cig skyes/ /dag pa'i bdag ni dga' bral lo/ /bden bar rang bzhin myong bzhin pa/ /smra
117a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing rigs ldan bu la ni/ tshig mi 'gyur ni don dang rtags/ /bde ba che la sbyor ba'o/ /shes rab bu ni bla ma yis/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /ces pa 'dzag pa spong ba'o/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/ /ces pa 'di
117a2(rgyud 'grel): yi don bshad na/ /dang po rtog pa sgom pa ste/ /de nas rtog med skye ba yin/ /zer ba mi 'thad rgyu 'dra las/ /'bras bu 'dra ba byung phyi ro/ /sA lu las ni khre min no/ /de na rtog med rgyu las ni/ /'bras bu rtog med ye shes skye/ /yang dag ye shes mdza' 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): nor bu/ /de la rnam par gnas pa ni/ /mi 'dzag ye shes dga' ba'i sems/ /bdag med chos rnams brjod du med/ /seng ge rims gnod sgra ldan pas/ /mu stegs de nyid mi shes pa/ /stong sgra ri dgag ngan 'jigs byed/ /kun tu 'gro ba bde chen po/ /
117a4(rgyud 'grel): don yong stobs ni sbyor bas brtson/ /ji ltar bab pa de bzhin du/ /dung khang gnas su slar gshegs pa'i/ /bde chen khyab pa yid ltar mgyogs/ /rgyal ba 'dod chags las rgyal dga' / /rnam rgyal rlung rgyal dga' ye shes/ /dgra las rgyal ba ma
117a5(rgyud 'grel): rig sogs/ /rten 'brel las rgyal lhan skyes so/ /'khor lo drug la sgyur ba ni/ /rtsa la thig le brgyan pa'o/ /stobs po che ni dbung bzhi ste/ /snang ba thob dang snang ba mched/ /brtan dang de kho na zhus bzhi'o/ /chags kyi steng phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /
117a6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon shu kra ye shes/ /tshegs kyi dga' gsum mchog ldan skyes/ /tshogs ni skad cig gsum yin te/ /rje ni mtshan med skad cig ma/ /tshogs ni phyag rgya gsum yin te/ /bdag po phyag rgya chen po'o/ /chos can bco brgyad de dag la/ /dbang
117a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas dbang ldan no/ /mthu chen bde chen gces pa la/ /rtag tu nyams med 'dzin pa ste/ /de nyid tshul chen rtags bcu thob/ /gzhan dring mi 'jog bcos ma yid/ /tshig rje dag gis mchog spyin nus/ /tshig ni so sor yang dag rig /tshis
117b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag smra mkhas ces pa ni/ /grub chen brgyad sems phrin las rnams/ /tshig gis nus pas nges chig rin /tshig la dbang ba don rig pa'o/ /tshig mdza' yas pa shes rab rgyas/ /spobs pa so sor rig pa'o/ /tshig bden kun rjod lha dkyil 'khor/ /bden par smra
117b2(rgyud 'grel): nga don dam ste/ /rdzogs rim rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /de yang mkha' 'gro kun spyod las/ /thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni/ /brtan par ngas ni rtag bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub phyir/ /sgom par mngon du gyur pa yin/ r/gyud rnams kyi ni rnal 'byor ba/ /
117b3(rgyud 'grel): bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bden pa bzhin no sdug bsngal la sogs/ /ston pa'o ni dga' bzhir ston/ /phyir mi ldog pa rlung grub pas/ /phyir mi 'ong ba thig le brtan/ /'dren ba rang gis rig gi rlung/ /hUM has bde rlung 'dren pa'o/ /rang rgyar
117b4(rgyud 'grel): de yis khams rgyas pa/ /bse ru a ba d+hU tI yin/ /tshul ni mya ngan 'das pa'o/ /nges 'byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /sna tshogs theg ba sna tshogs lam/ /las byung ji ltar de ltar snang/ /'byung ba chen po rgya gcig pa/ /zhes pa 'byung ba lnga yin la/ /chen
117b5(rgyud 'grel): po de las chos kun skyes rgyu ni rgyu dang rkyen nyid do/ /gcig pho chos dang chos can gyi/ /rgyu rkyen gyur pa 'di nyid yin/ /chos ni 'byung la chos can ni/ /rnam par shes pa de la drug /shes pa skye ba'ang chos yin te/ /shes pa nyid na ci zhig shes/ /shes med
117b6(rgyud 'grel): sems ni 'od gsal ba/ /don dam des na mya ngan 'das/ /'du shes med 'gog snyoms 'jug yin/ /theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ni/ srid pa gsum la dmigs nas ni/ /mig 'phrul lta bu'i rnam pa yis/ /li la thub pa'i yon len/ /kun rdzob 'khor dang myang
117b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das nyis/ /'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'o/ /de nyid do du bden 'dod pa/ /nyams thos phyir pa yi lugs/ /shes pa rnang ba yin no zhes/ /gsal ba dam pa'i don 'dod pa/ /cig shos rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /khyad par
118a1(rgyud 'grel): cung zad yod min pas/ /kun rdzob mig 'phrul lta bur snang/ /don dam dang bzhin med pa nyid/ /gnyis med phyag rgya chen por 'dod/ /rdo rje gsum gyi byed pa la/ /'byung dang 'byung 'gyur chos rnams gnas/ /sku rdo rje srab bas/ /
118a2(rgyud 'grel): gsher ba chu ste dro ba me/ /bskyod brlung ste go 'byed mkha' / /gsung rdo rje yi rnam pa ni/ /A li shes rab ye shes khams/ /kA li thabs las khams lnga 'byung/ /ka tsa Ta ta pa lnga sa/ /kha tsha tha tha pha lnga chu/ /ga dza Da d+ha rba lnga me/ /g+ha dzhe Dha d+ha b+ha lnga rlung/ /
118a3(rgyud 'grel): da nya Na na ma lda mkha' / /katsa Ta ta pa lnga ye shes/ /mgrin rkan spyi bo mchu so las/ /'byung phyir mkha' rlung me chus/ /a ku e ta Th+ka lnga ni/ /mgrin sgra nam mkha' i khams yin no/ /tsi tsu k+Sha ya sha lnga ni/ /rkan sgra rlung gi khams yin/ /ri Ta ra Sha ar lnga ni/ /
118a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo'i sgra ste me yi khams/ /u pu pi wa o lnga ni/ /mchu sgra chu yi khams yin no/ /li tu las a lnga ni/ /so sgra sa yi khams yin/ /'byung gnas lnga las byung ba yi/ /'byung ba'i nus pa'i me tog ni/ kha dog yi ge dug lngar smin/ /yi ge dang bo'i sgra
118a5(rgyud 'grel): rtag pa/ /dbyangs sgra dbyangs la gsal byed dgra/ /gsal byed rang nyid yin par 'dod/ /gsal dbangs thabs shes gnod pa med/ /dbyangs yig dgra gyur 'chi ba ste/ /gsal byed dgrar gyur nad gyi thebs/ /yan lag dgar gyur dpal 'phrog byed/ /dbang thad mi mthun rnyed pa med/ /
118a6(rgyud 'grel): de rnaMs mthun par gyur pas na/ /tshe ring nad med dpal 'byor ldan/ /phal pas btang snyoms 'bras gsal min/ /cha dgra rlung la rlung dgra sa/ /sa dgra me la me dgra chu/ /nam mkha' kun grogs mthun pa'o/ /sa ba shes chu la chu bshes sa/ /me bshes rlung la rlung bshes
118a7(rgyud 'grel): me/ /rlung thun chu la me bra nas/ /chu bran me la sa bran rlung/ /dgras gnod pa shes kyi phan bar byes/ /bran ni tshul phan phar gnad pa'o/ /phal bas gsum char med par 'dod/ /'byung chen srog la 'byung chung lus/ /yan lag dpal la rkyen dbang thang/ /
118b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pur gyur na de nyid kyi/ /bye brag las ni bzhir shes bya/ /srog mthun che ring las mthun pas/ /nad med dpal mthun dpal dang ldan/ /dbang thang mthun pas longs spyod 'phel/ /mi mthun tshe thung nang mang zhing/ /sems med dpal med longs spyod 'bris
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bal pas phan dang gnod pa med/ /bran gyis gcig gnod gcig la phan/ /mkhas gnyis dbyings dang ye shes bzang/ /gsum ni dbyar med mchog yin te/ /bzhi pas bshig par byed pa yin/ /rlung gnyis srog rtsol ngan pa ste/ /sum gyi ye shes
118b3(rgyud 'grel): bzad por 'gyur/ /me gnyis phal ba yun thung 'thab/ /gsum ni sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'khrug /chu gnyis bzang po gsum yang btub/ /bzhi pa thams cad gong dang mtshungs/ /sa gnyis bzang po gsum pa btub/ /bzhi pa bzang po lnga pa spangs/ /
118b4(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun phar gnod stobs las shes/ /stobs mnyam dpal dang dbang thang srog /gsum gyis stobs las phan tshun shes/ /de mnyam kun du 'gran par byos/ /phan 'dogs de yi grogs gyis bya/ /gnod byed yang zer de yi dgra yis bya/ /tshe dang nan dang
118b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang grog /srog lus dpal dad dbang thang la/ /de dang de yi gnyen pos byed/ /sa ni ser pos grub bzhi/ /chu ni dkar po chu zlum pa/ /me ni dmar po me gru gsum/ /rlung mi sngon rlung zla gam/ /nam mkha' kun grogs mdog dbyibs bral/ /de nyid
118b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu phan gnod dka' / /'byung ba re la las drug ste/ bsnan dang dbab dang bsreg pa dang/ tshim dang gso dang dgyes pa'o/ /re re 'ang thig les brgyan par bya/ /sgron ma'i ming la mtshon byas na/ /oM hh(rgyud 'grel): phaT ni bsnun pa'o/ /oM ata(rgyud 'grel): hUM ni 'bebs pa'o/ /oM
118b7(rgyud 'grel): rtA(rgyud 'grel): bo Sha Ta sreg pa'i/ /oM ny+dza(rgyud 'grel): na ma tshim pa'o/ /oM ltA(rgyud 'grel): swAhA gos pa'o/ /oM ataM pa ShaT dgyes pa'o/ /'byung ba dar dang rgyud dang mnyam/ /gsos btab shes smad smrar res gnyis gnyis nas/ /de re la yang shes par bya/ /'byung chung nyi shu rtsa lnga la/ /dbyibs
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog las kyang nyi shu lnga/ /dus phyogs nyon mongs nyi shu lnga/ /spong thob 'dod pas shes par bya/ /sham+b+ha la dang sing ga gling/ /'dzam bu gling sogs dpag med na/ /yi ge grangs dang gog sa dang/ /ming mi 'dra ba gang yod kyang/ /
119a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gnas lnga las byung shes pas/ /de yis sgra rnams thams cad shes/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi/ /sngags kyi de nyid mi shes par/ /gang zhig lha sgrub las byed pa/ /nam mkha' bza' bar 'dod dang mtshungs/ /de phyir sngags pa rnams la ni/
119a3(rgyud 'grel): phan 'dod dri med 'od kyi don/ /cung zad bdag gis 'dir ni blangs/ /de yang dgyes pa rdo rje las/ /po la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /reg pa sra bas yi khams/ /gsher ba chu ste dro ba med/ /bskyod pa rlung khams bde nam mkha' / /lnga yis yongs su bskor ba yin/ /
119a4(rgyud 'grel): dge slong nyon mongs med pa'o/ /dgra bcom 'dod chags bde 'gyur ba/ /zag pa dri chu khu zad pa'o/ /'dod chags 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /bral bas dbang gsum ye shes la/ /dbang po thub pa bzhi ba'i dus/ /bde ba rnyed pas mi 'dzag pa'o/ /
119a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med thob ni 'khor ba med/ /bsil bar gyur pa chags pa zad/ /rnyog pa med ni dangs ma'o/ /de yang 'khor lo sdom pa las/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags rnam par spangs/ /gdul bya de rnams shes nas kyang/ /yi ge las byung rnam par spangs/ /
119a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa nyid du gyur nas phyir/ /nam mkha' lta bu 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rigs pa dang ni gsum skyes srid/ /rkang bar shes rab ye shes la/ /ldan pa bzhi pa'i ye shes so/ /bde gshegs thig le 'jig rten rig /nyon mongs byang
119a7(rgyud 'grel): lam rtogs pa'i mchog /bdag gir mi 'dzin dga' ba ste/ /las rgya yin no ngar mi 'dzin/ /mchog dga' yi ni chos rgya'o/ /bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/ /zhes pa lhan skyes dam rgyal/ /'khor ba'i
119b1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol mthar sor pa/ /dga' bral dga' ba phyag rgya che/ /bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/ /rim gyis bzhi par gnas pa'o/ /shes pa 'ba' zhig chos rnams te/ /des gsal lhan skyes ye shes rtogs/ /shes rab mtshon cha stong nyid kyis/ /nyon mongs nye
119b2(rgyud 'grel): nyen rnam mthoms pa'o/ /dam pa bla ma rdo rje 'chang/ /chos kyi brgyad khri bzhi stong la/ /chos rgyal e baM chos kun dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi pha ma'o/ /gsal bar ka li ldan pa a/ /de las chos rnams thams cad skyes/ /de yang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las/ /
119b3(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li ma rtogs par/ /gal te rdo rje'i chos 'dod pa/ /'dis ni 'bras bu ma yin te/ /phub ma rdung bar byed dang mtshungs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'jig rten ma rtogs log rtogs so/ /snang bar zhed pa'i de nyid mthong/ /mchog ni lhan skyes ye shes so/ /chos kyi
119b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug haM las ni/ /rang byin rlob pa chos kyi rgyal/ /legs pa'i lam ni chags bcas pa/ /spyod lam mi spyod ston pa'o/ /don grub mchog tu mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa grub pa ste zhes pa/ /las rgya sdug bsngal snod yin pas/ /spangs te ye shes phyag
119b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mngon byed pa'o/ /kun tu rtog pa mi mo la/ /brten pa'i bden ba thams cad spangs/ /rnam par mi rtog yan lag drug /pham mo bdag med ma brten te/ /dbyings mi bzad pa'i ye shes thob/ /'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po/ /de yang
119b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ /rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis/ /dngos po gang la gang rtog pa/ /de nyid kun du brtags pa yi/ /ngo bo nyid med de med do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'o spang bya kho na'am/ /zhe na chos dbyings dam pa la/ /zad mi shes pa'i thabs yod pas/ /blo ngan
119b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bstan pa yin/ /de yang klu las khros pa las/ /zhi bas phan par ma gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs nying khro bor sprul/ /ji ltar ji ltar btul gyur pa/ /'di yi byed pa rdo rje sems/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bsod nams snying rje chen po la/ /lan pa chaT
120a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i glan pa'o/ /bsod nams mi 'dzag bde ba'i sems/ /tshogs ni phyag rgya chen po'i thams/ /de yang/ lus la ye shes chen po gnas/ /'di rtogs grol bar kun 'dod la/ /de rtogs thabs ni bsod ye shes/ /yin par
120a2(rgyud 'grel): kun mthun thabs mi mkhas/ /bsod nams phyir sogs ye shes ni/ /ble yis byas pas thar pa ring/ /'dir ni bsod nams dkyil 'khor che/ /bcud rnams kyis mchod gnyis 'phel pas/ /bde stong rgyas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'di 'dra bsod
120a3(rgyud 'grel): nams gang la srid/ /ye shes tshogs kyang de nyid do/ /des na rgyud rnams kun las kyang/ /dka' thub dka' sbyang 'dir mi dgos/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la/ /ci bde bar ni spyad par 'grub/ /ces gsungs so/ /ye shes nor bya dmigs
120a4(rgyud 'grel): med bde/ /ye shes haM skyes thig le'i khams/ /'byung gnas cha na de nyid do/ /de yang rgyud las 'di skad gsungs/ /rlung bcings pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsregs/ /rtog med ye shes la sbyor ba/ /lus kyi thabs la
120a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa mchog /ces gsungs so/ /rang la ye shes ldan ba yis/ /yod mi shes pa 'di yin te/ /pha rol ye shes yod med shes/ /yang na mdza' bral rtogs pa'o/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa'o/ /zhes pa ba spu'i bu ga nas/ /
120a6(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa sprul te 'gro don nus/ /'di 'dra'i bde stong snying rje'i sems/ /med par dka' thub zas spong sogs/ /rgya mtsho dus sbal khog gsho 'dra/ /rtag pa mi nyams kun rgyal ba/ /rtsa stong phrag ni bdun cu gnyis/ /bde chen rang bzhin rgyas pa
120a7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rnal 'byor can ni sgo gsum dag /de yang lus las gsungs pa ni/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni de bshad do/ /zhes so/ /bsam gtan dga' bzhi bsam bya ni/ /rlung dang rtsa rnams dran pa'o/ /yang na snying gar
120b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gnas/ /cha med dran pa blo ldan mchog /so sor rang rig mi g.yo ba/ /zhes pa gzhon nu sa ta dzA/ /rig la smra bar ma nus pa'o/ /mchog gi dang po lha cig skyes/ /sku gsum 'chad pa rdo rje sems/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /zhes pa ma log log pa dang/ /rmi
120b2(rgyud 'grel): laM rmi lam chen po dang bsad? pha gnas skabs lnga po ni/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /khyab bdag lhan cig skyes pa'i/ /ye shes lnga ni gnas skabs lnga/ /ye shes dag dang ldan pa'o/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor na/ /shes pa 'di du sbyong ba yin/ /
120b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas lnga bdag rigs lnga la/ /cod pan lnga phung dag rtags su/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ba'o/ /spyan lnga mtshan ma'i rtags lnga/ /bltas pas chags pa med pa 'chang/ /de yang dra ba sdom pa las/ /dang po ri dags sred du snang ba ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dud kha'i rnam
120b4(rgyud 'grel): pa can/ /gsum ba me khyed dang 'dra bzhi pa ni/ /sprin med nam mkha' mtshan ma lnga pa ni/ /shin tu 'od gal rang gi snang ba 'chang/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa'o/ /zhes pa sprul longs sogs mthong la/ /nyon mo'i rtags mthong mngon shes drug
120b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras po byang chub sems/ /dam pa'i mchog ni de bskyed pa'o/ /shes pa srid 'byung dkyil 'khor la/ /skye gnas med ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /de yang gsungs pa/ /skyed pa'i rim la rab gnas shing/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom byed pa/ /sangs
120b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thabs dang ldan pa yis/ /skabs? kyi sen mo bzhin du bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /chos la 'byung ba b+ha ga la/ /ba gzhan pa yi srid pa srel/ /gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /ces pas lhan skyes ye shes so/ /dngos de skyes ma thag
120b7(rgyud 'grel): tu ni/ /kun gyi don grub 'gro ba'i bdag /smin cing 'khrul 'khor ldan pa yis/ /nam mkha' las byung rang 'byung ba/ /rtags brgyad mthong ba 'di lta ste/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /rang sems 'bar ba'i rnam pa can/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes
121a1(rgyud 'grel): chen/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /zla ba'i ye shes rnam snang mdzad/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i ye shes rin chen 'byung/ /'gro ba'i ye shes mar me sgron/ /rA hu ye shes don yod grub/ /gzi brjid chen po
121a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba/ /blog gi ye shes mdza' yas nyid/ /sngags drag mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /thig le gnas pa'i ye shes te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag nyid do/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ /zla sngon snang ba'i ye shes ni/ /
121a3(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dpal nyid du 'dod/ /gtsug tor chen po'i lta stangs kyis/ /re khA nag po ye shes mthong/ /dus kyi 'khor lo thod ba can/ /rmad byung gtsug ni rdo rje 'chang/ /thams cad mthong ba mchog thob ba'o/ /nam kha'i bdag po ha ra na/ /sna
121a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ston pa yon tan no/ /de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /ta ra na bcings yon tan gyis/ /srid pa gsum po ma g.yos pas/ /nam mkha' i bdag por de gyur te/ /rtags bcu la sogs sna tshogs ston/ /zhes gsungs so/ /sangs
121a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyab kun gyi bdag po ni/ /rtags rnams snang bas dngos po mchog /de 'dra mthong ba'i rnal 'byor te/ /kun dga' chen po'i mig dang ldan/ /ldan chos lta stangs bzhi yin te/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rtags mtshan rnams/ /skyes pa po ni yan
121a6(rgyud 'grel): lag drug /mchod cing brjod pa bsnyen bsgrub bzhi/ /drang srong chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs gsum gnas dang zhing ye shes/ /'chad ba? de la bde ba yod/ /gsang sngags 'chad ni rnal 'byor pa/ /thig le mi nyams gsang sngags
121a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /dam tshig chen po rtag tu bde/ /gtso bo rtsa gsum dkon mchog gsum/ /'dzin pa de nang thig le 'dzin/ /theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/ /zhes pa lhan skyes ye shes rten/ /kal pa dang ni khyogs gdugs so/ /don yod thig
121b1(rgyud 'grel): le? thabs? pa ni/ /rlung gi 'bigs pas rnam par rgyal/ /'dzin pa 'khor lo drug tu ni/ /rlung 'gag chan po rdo rje zhags/ /rlung gis de blangs rdo rje yi/ /lcags kyu zhags ba che zhes bya/ /yang na zhags pa che zhes pa/ /lte ba'i 'og rtsa 'khyil ba ni/ /nong rgyas
121b2(rgyud 'grel): ?? can rlung de yis/ /d+hA? tI nas 'phags byang sems 'gugs/ /de la zhags pa zhes bsdod do/ /lus ni yul chen nyi shu bzhi/ /dpral ba la sogs sbyar ba dang/ /snying dbus pad+ma'i 'dab mar ldan/ /gnas gtso yin te rtsa lnga yis/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa
121b3(rgyud 'grel): ?? dag rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //le'u bdun pa rdo'i rig? tshigs su bcad pa bcu dang gcig /dang po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni/ /rdo rje a ba d+hA tI la/ /de nang rlung ni 'jigs byed do/ /'jig par byed ni de
121b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags bshig /sngo bo'i rgyal po dga' bral mdza' / /so sor sdud sogs gdong drug la/ /'jigs pa des ni rtog pa gcod/ /mig drug mngon she lag drug rtags/ /stobs dang ldan ni 'dod chags kyis/ /chags pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /ked dus spyi bo'i haM
121b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ /mche? ba a shad gtsigs pa'o/ /bla ma'i gdams pas gtum mo sbor/ /ha la ha la mkha' ye shes/ /gdong brgya rtsa rlung spong ba yi/ /ye shes mi 'dra gdong brgya'o/ /gshin rje gnyis med ye shes te/ /gshed po de yis gnyis snang 'joms/ /
121b6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs ?? rgyal ni bdung bzhi rgyal/ /rdo rje yang dag ye shes la/ /shugs can zhes pas 'jigs par byed/ /rdo rje drag po lus ngag yid/ /gsang ba 'dus sogs las gsungs so/ /rdo rje snying po chos kyi tshul/ /sgyu 'phrul mA yA e dang baM/ /rdo rje ling ga
121b7(rgyud 'grel): gsus po che/ /rgyas shing shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje las skyes rdor bum nang/ /dzA lan d+ha ra dbu rgyan par/ /bde bas gang la rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snying pos sku gsung thugs/ /mkha' dra gsang gnas las skyes bde/ /mi g.yo srog rtsol gnas pa la/
122a1(rgyud 'grel): ral pa gcig pa do gcig grol/ /bsgyings pa de 'dra gang yod pa'o/ /glang chen bde ba ko rlon ni/ /lus kun khyab cing ma nyes par byas/ /de ldan pas na gos su gyon/ /grags chen bde bas gang ba la/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs dpa' bo'i gang/ /hi
122a2(rgyud 'grel): he zhes sgrogs dpa' mo'i gang/ /'jigs par byed pa sngon bde myong/ /gad mo chen po bde chen thig /gang rgyangs can ni lhung ba'i sku/ /ha brgyad brjod pa rdo rje'i gang/ /cher sgrogs pa ni rgyun chad med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems/ /sems dpa' chen po
122a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med bde/ /rdo rje b+ho la rgyal po ni/ /de yi nang gnas bde ba che/ /rdo rje drag po stong pa nyid/ /rtag tu de ldan dga' ba che/ /rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs/ /zhes pa hUM bzhis gnas bzhir ni/ /dga' bzhi nyams su myong ba'o/ /rdo rje a ba d+hU tI la/ /mda' thoT
122a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni mtshon cha can/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung 'gags pa/ /mtshon chen de yis rnam rtog gcod/ /rdo rje gnyis med ye shes kyis/ /ral gri nyon mongs ma lus gcod/ /rdo rje rlung rnams kun 'chad ba/ /sna yi rtse mor yungs 'bru bsgom/ /de nyid
122a5(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rdo rje can/ /de yang dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /sna rtser yungs kar zhes brjod pa/ /de yang srog dang rtsol bar brjod/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus la/ /srid gsum gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje gcig pu
122a6(rgyud 'grel): lam rgyal/ /de brten bde bas g.yul sel ba'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba tsaN Da li/ /mig mi bzang ni ri dags mi/ /spyi bor rdo je 'bar ba ste/ /zhes pa yar rtse mad rtse 'bar/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa bcu drug la/ /de yang phyed phyed 'bebs pa che/ /khams
122a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag rgya chen por dbang/ /mig brgya bas te mang la bya/ /rdo rje mig ni sha yi spyan/ /de yis gzugs brnyan mthong ba'o/ /lus ni rdo rje ba spu can/ /ces pa ba spu bye phyed bzhi/ /nang du thig le'i kha 'bu'o/ /de nyid rdo rje'i spu yin te/ /gcig
122b1(rgyud 'grel): pu lus ni rgyun chad med/ /sen mo dkar dmar 'dres pa las/ /skyes pa bde stong rdo rje'i rtse/ /mi 'dzag rtag tu dga' ba'i yid/ /rdo rje snying po rnam rtog med/ /pags pa mkhregs ni skyon mi tshugs/ /rdo rje phreng 'dzin yul rtsa bzhir/ /thim dang longs spyod
122b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa gsum/ /nyin mtshan dus 'das dpal dang ldan/ /de 'dra'i byed gsum rdo rje rgyan/ /rnal 'byor lus la brgyan pa ste/ /kun la bde ba'i gad rgyangs ni/ /dga' chen ha ha nges par sgrogs/ /yi ge drug pa 'khor lo drug /rdo rje'i sgra ni a k+Sha ra/ /'gyur
122b3(rgyud 'grel): ba med yi ge'o/ /'jam dbyangs thig le chen po la/ /de ni mi 'phro sgra che ba/ /'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa/ /ces pa zag pa dgra gcig bu/ /de 'dul thabs chen stong gsum gyi/ /nam mkha' i mdza' klus sga sgrogs pa'o/ /sgra dang ldan pa theg chen chos/ /sna
122b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs thas lam bstan pa las/ /rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di nyid do/ /snying ga'i phyi yi rtsa bdun dang/ /'og gi rtsa bzhi dri chen dang/ /dri chu khrag dang khu ba 'bab/ /bcu gcig dag pa shlo ka/ bcu dang chag rkang gcig lhag pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs kyi rgya cher
122b5(rgyud 'grel): 'grel pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //le'u brgyad pa 'od dpag med/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi le'u la/ /tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes bstan/ /de bzhin nyid ni d+hU tI'o/ /yang dag bdag med g.yas g.yon
122b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung/ /yang dag mdza' ste rlung grub pa/ /yi ge med ni rnam rtog med/ /stong nyid mi 'dzag gang ba'i sems/ /smra ba A li kA li la/ /khyu mchog bdud rnams 'joms ba ste/ /zab cing stong nyid rgya chen snang/ /dbyer med dbyer med sgra sgrogs pa/ /chos kyi
122b7(rgyud 'grel): dung ste chos 'byung na/ /rtsa ni bde skyed dung can ma/ /bde ba dpag med sgra chen ldan/ /chos kyi gaN+DI mgrin par gnas/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong chos stong po/ /sgra bo che ni gsungs rdo rje/ /mi gnas phyag rgya chen po la/ /mya ngan 'das pa chos sku'o/ /phyogs
123a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu yul dang yul can te/ /chos kyi rnga chen rtsa rlung phub/ /gzugs med chos sku stong pa nyid/ /gzugs bzang longs sku bde ba che/ /dam pa ste ni rdo rje'i sku/ /sna tshogs gzugs can sbrul sku'o/ /yid ni bde chen spros bral las/ /
123a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /gzugs rnams rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba la/ /thams cad rten dang brten bcas las/ /brten nas sku bzhi'i snang ba'i dpal/ /gzugs brnyan nyin mchan brtags bcu bzhi/ /ma lus 'chang ba 'thob pa'o/ /mtshungs ba med
123a3(rgyud 'grel): na 'dod yin lngas/ /mi gnod 'phel zhing cher grags pa/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs mthar phyin/ /lam dang 'bras bu gnyis yin no/ /'phags pa nyams pa med pa'o/ /lam ni 'khor lo drug yin no/ /
123a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mthob gtsug tor la/ /thig le mi nyams gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi rtog ni rdo rje rtser/ /rgyas pa po ni bde bas gang/ /'jig rten gsum ni lus ngag yid/ /gzhon lus gcig ni gsum pa'i dus/ /gnas brtan sprul ba'i 'khor lo la/ /rgan
123a5(rgyud 'grel): po ltan skyes ye shes so/ /skye dgu'i bdag ni bug dgu bsngams/ /de yang sgyu ma chen po las/ /mig gnyis dang ni rna ba gnyis/ /de bzhin sna dang kha dag dang/ /yid kyis snying po dgag pa ni/ /seng ge rnam grol phyag rgya che/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
123a6(rgyud 'grel): gcing bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de las skyes pa'i bde ba'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /ces pa 'phel 'grib bcu drug go /sdu gu gtum mo'i na chung la/ /'khor gsum 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /'jig rten mig la sogs pa la/ /
123a7(rgyud 'grel): shes legs skyon gyis ma gos par/ /ston pa slob dpon zhes brjod do/ /'jig rten 'byung ba lnga ldan k+Sha/ /slob dpon bzhi pa ster ba ste/ /de la 'jigs pa med pa mchog /gnyis med sbyor ba mgon skyob po/ /'jig rten yid bcugs don
123b1(rgyud 'grel): dam dang/ kun rdzob phan tshun mi 'gal ba'o/ /skyab dang 'bab pa skyob pa ni/ /bzlog pas ye shes bla na med/ /nam mkha' mdza' ni shes rab la/ /longs spyod pa ni gnyis med sbyor/ /thams cad mkhyen pa sbyor drug gis/ /rtags ma lus pa thob pa las/ /
123b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mtsho ni zad mi shes/ /yon tan chen pos gang ba'o/ /ma rig rten 'brel bcu gnyis la/ /sgo nga'i sbubs ni mi shes bstums/ /'byed pa gsum pa'i ye shes so/ /yang na lus la sangs rgyas ni/ /yod pa ma rtogs sgo nga'i sbubs/ /'byed pa bla mas
123b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sbor?/ /'di de lam mchog yin par gsungs/ /srid pa'i dra ba mi shes bsgribs/ /'joms pa po ni rtogs pa'o/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba nye nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed dga' ba bzhi/ /dbang bzhi las rnyed ye shes bzhi'o/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
123b4(rgyud 'grel): las rgya ste/ /pha rol phyin pa ye shes rgya/ /rgya gram gnyis med bde chen po/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur gang rnyed pa/ /de ni ye shes dbang bskur ste/ /cod pan can ni gtsug tor smin/ /rdzogs pa rdo rje nor bu rtse/ /sangs rgyas bde chen nyams pa med/ /rgyan du thogs
123b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bde tshan du/ /ye shes lnga ldan dbu rgyan no/ /gsum ni lus dag yid gsum la sdug bsngal srog rtsol 'tshed segs myags/ /sdug bsngal zhi ni rtogs rlung 'gags/ /gsum sel dug gsum sel ba'o/ /mdza' yas lhan cig skyes
123b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba/ /grol gsum thob ni sku gsum mo/ /sgrib pa sa chu me rlung mkha' / /rags phra rab phra don spyi dang/ /sems dpa' dang ni bcu po'o/ /kun las nges par grol ba ni/ /du ba la sogs bcu thob pa'o/ /de dus tsam nam mkha' ltar/ /lhan
123b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /nyon mongs dri ma gong gi bcu/ /kun las 'das pa mdza' phyin pa'o/ /de yi dus na lhan skyes dor/ /dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen por 'dod/ /sems na kun ni spang bya la
124a1(rgyud 'grel): ?? klu chen po ni gnyen po ste/ /dga' bzhi reg dug la sogs pa/ /'dod sogs pham byas klu chen po'o/ /yon tan theg pa chen po la/ /thad can rnams ni gsangs sngags te/ /thod ces do thod 'di yin no/ /nyon mongs
124a2(rgyud 'grel): kun las ces pa ni/ /spong dang thar pa 'dod pa'o/ /rnam par ri? grol ni bde chen rtogs/ /rtsol ba med par dang gis grol/ /shing thag bsregs pa'i thal phung bzhin/ /mkha' ltar mdza' med bder gnas pa/ /de nyid yid bzhin nor bu che
124a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'bral ldan pa 'chad ba'o/ /rin chen zag med bde ba ste/ /kun mchog phyag rgya chen po la/ /khyab pa'i bdag ni brtan g.yo la'o/ /dpag bsam shing chen d+hU tI la/ /rgyas pa rtsa rnams kun du ni/ /rlung dang thig les khyab pa'o/ /dum pa
124a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang? bo? nor bu la/ /che ba'i mchog ni mi 'dzag bde/ /de yi byed pa ci zhe na/ /sems can gdul bya la dgongs nas/ /kun don byed pa bde 'phel ba'o/ /phan 'dogs yon tan brgyad thob pas/ /sems can phan pas mnyen bshin pa/ /
124a5(rgyud 'grel): bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ /zhes pa phyi rol de bzhin nad/ /phyi rol rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyis/ /skye dang las dang phyogs nang dang/ /g.yo dang rkun po don rnams dang/ /ltas dang tsha tshad nad rnams dang/ /kun gyi bya ba shes par
124a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /nang du g.yas g.yon dkyil 'khor lnga/ /phyi nang don rnams sgrub pa'o/ /gzhan yang chu srin? kum pa nya?/ /lug dang khyu mchog me thun/ /kar ka seng ge bu mo srad/ /sdig pa gzhu 'ji bcu gnyis kyis/ /nyi ma zla ba
124a7(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'o/ /de yis rang 'byung la sogs shes/ /dram shes lus ngag ye shes gis?/ /dam ldan shes rab ma la ni/ /brtse dang shugs dang drung pa dang/ /mi 'dzag bde ba dam tshig bzhi/ /lus sems kun du khyab pa'i bdag
124b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'byung ba las gsungs ba/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rgyug pa'i/ /rab tu rgyug cing 'phro ba'i sems/ /rnam rtog yul la 'dzag pa'i sems/ /bde bar gzung bar the tsom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /sems can dbang shes rab 'bring bzhi/ /dus
124b2(rgyud 'grel): shes de la dbang bzhi ster/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pas shes/ /rnam grol gsum dam las ye shes/ /mkhas pa po nis 'og sogs/ /dbang thob nas ni yon tan gyis/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa rnams/ /ldan zhing de la ye shes ldan/ /yon tan shes shes
124b3(rgyud 'grel): de la brjod/ /chos shes bkra shis 'jig rten bde/ /rab bkra shis ni 'jig rtog 'das/ /bkra shis kun g yi shis pa/ /dga' rnam pa bcu drug po/ /nyams su myong bas grags pa yi/ /bkra shis snyan grags dge ba thob/ /chags sogs ma spangs
124b4(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byin che/ /tshim par byed pa dga' ston che/ /dga' chen lhan skyes rol pa ni/ /mig 'phrul lta bu'i snang ba la/ /chen po don dam phyag rgya che/ /bkur sti lus las rtsol ba byed/ /rim gro rlung las legs sbyor ba/ /phun sum tshogs pa yon
124b5(rgyud 'grel): tan thob/ /mchog tu dga' ba 'jig rten la/ /grags bdag dpal ni lhan cig skyes/ /mchog ldan lhan skyes yod pa las/ /mchog sbyin bzhi pa'i gtso bo ste/ /de nyid skyabs kyi dam pa dang/ /gnyen por che bas skyabs su 'os/ /'jig rten dgra ni dug
124b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum ste/ /rab kyi mchog ni bde stong ngo/ /de yis 'jigs pa ma lus pa/ /shin du med pas sel ba'o/ /gtsug phud 'khor ba'i bde ba la/ /phud bu dbang gis rab tu bcings/ /lcang lo can ni gzhan don du/ mdzes shing rgyas par 'gengs pa'o/ /ral pa
124b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par sdom/ /lan tshar cod pan thogs ldan pa'o/ /gdong lnga ye shes lnga yin te/ /gtsug pud lnga dang ldan pa ni/ /rigs lnga dag dang ldan pa'o/ /gnas skabs lnga po me tog thogs/ /shes pa gnas skabs lnga po ni/ /ma log log dang rmi
125a1(rgyud 'grel): lam dang/ /rmi lam che dang sad pa'o/ /me tog thogs pa rdzas 'dzin pa'o/ /mgo zlum kha kha mu kha la/ /brtul zhugs rnyed dang ma rnyed pa/ /bde ba chen po 'dzin pa ni/ /tshangs par spyod pa mi nyams pa/ /brtul zhugs mchog kyang
125a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid do/ /dga' thub nyan thos mthar thug pa/ /pha rol phyin ba dka' thub che/ /rdo rje'i theg pa nyid yin te/ /de nyid gsang ba'i rgyud la su/ /kha chu tsam zhig zags pa na/ /mkha' 'gro ma mes rnal 'byor pa/ /bsgral te khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /dmyal ba zhes
125a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang de las 'byung zhes so/ /gtsang gnas dam pa skyon med pa /go'u ta ma rigs mnyams/ /bram ze tshangs pa rig byed yin/ /snyan nga dgas srid bsrungs des brjod dang/ /mchod sbyin bzhi bo tshangs pas shes/ /mya ngan 'das ni don dam pa/ /tshangs pa bral pa
125a4(rgyud 'grel): thob? pa'o/ /grol ba stong pa thar pa ni/ /bde chen spros bral rnam grol lus/ /rnam grol phyag rgya chen po la/ /zhi ba zhi ba dga' bzhi nyid/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /ji ltar me yis tshig pa la/ /me de nyid kyis 'jugs te 'cho/ /'dod chags me yis chig
125a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /'dod chags nyid gyis rnam grol byed/ /zhes so/ /mya ngan 'das pa chos kyi sku/ /mya ngan 'grel ni gzugs kyi sku/ /rnam par bshad pas de legs par/ /mya ngan 'das pa thob par nye/ /de ni mdza' bral ye shes so/ /de yin pa yi rgyu mtshan
125a6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa/ /zhes pa bde ba dga' mchog dga' / /sdug pa dga' bral dgos pa ste/ /mthar gyur ltan skyes ye shes so/ /mi 'dzag dga' ba chags bral la/ /yul yul kun las 'das pa'o/ /thub pa med pa spang bya la/ /rgyal
125a7(rgyud 'grel): bar byas pa dpe med pa/ /mi mngon dga' ba 'gro bar min/ /yi snang mchog dga' chags par min/ /gsal byed min ni dga' bal la/ me 'gyur lhan cig skyes ba ste/ /kun 'grong ba pa po de nyid/ /pra shing d+hu tI brag med nyams/ /sa bon rtog pa'i dri ma
125b1(rgyud 'grel): ?? rdul med chags nga'i rdul med cing/ /rdul bral dngos po'i zhen pa spangs/ /dri ma med pa bzhi pa'i dus/ /tes pa spangs par pa bzhin rig/ skyon med pa ni ma bsgribs pa'o/ /shin du sad pa dbang dus su/ /go rtogs skyes pa de yin la/ /legs par
125b2(rgyud 'grel): ?? ni de nyid dang/ /ma bral rtag tu ldan pa'o/ /kun shes gzugs sogs thams cad la/ /lhan sgyes shos pa kun reg pa/ /dam pa ni mchog mi 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa kun bzhir gnas/ /de yang mdo las 'di skad du/ /thog ma med pa dus kyi
125b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te/ /de yod pas na 'gro kun dang/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'byung pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdun po 'gags pa 'od gsal te/ /'od gsal rtog med chos nyid 'das/ /'das pa gnyis med ye shes de/ /chig gi
125b4(rgyud 'grel): yul min ?? brjod? bral/ /de yang he yi rdo rje las/ /dag gi lam 'das spyod yul bral/ bla ma'i dus mdza' bsten pas shes/ /tshul 'chad ba ni bla ma yin/ /dus mdza' bsten pas lhun grub tu/ /rnam par rtogs med ye shes ni/ /gsum pa'i dus su nyams su
125b5(rgyud 'grel): myong/ /'jig rten kun las 'das pa'o/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rtogs pa'ang de/ /las byed pa ni dai 'dra bas/ /rang bzhan gnyis ka smin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /ces pa de ni rtogs pa'i don/ /sangs rgyas rang gi do gad la/ /thog ma mkha' 
125b6(rgyud 'grel): ba skye ba med/ /mkha' dad 'dra bas bar du yang/ /gnas dus nyid nas mkha' dang 'dra/ /dpar na gzugs brnyan scad pa bzhen/ rgyu lam 'bras bu rnam dag pas/ /re dogs kun dang bral ba'o/ /de ltar yin pa'i 'thad pa yang/ /dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /zhes
125b7(rgyud 'grel): bdus gsum dag pa'o/ /de thabs gang las skyes she na/ /ye shes lhan cig skyes pa la/ /mig gcig d+hU tI neng yin te/ /dri med de ru rlung sems zhugs/ /ye shes lus can bde stong gang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid/ /ma bsten rang lam
126a1(rgyud 'grel): byon gshegs byed/ /tshig gi dbang phyug rlung gnas pa/ /smra ba che ni gsung rdo smra ba'i rlung la dbang phyug thig/ smra ba'i rgyal bo rtsad? son pa/ /smra ba'i raM pa gsung rdo rje/ /mchog gi gsung ni gsung dag pa'o/ /rlung grub smra ba'i seng ge nyid/ /nyon mongs
126a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag mtshungs pa med/ /kun du lta ba spang blang med/ /mchog tu dga' ba ye shes snang/ /gzi brjid gsum mo ye shes la/ /phreng ba rgyud 'brel goms pa las/ /bltan sdug ni yon tan thob/ /'od bzang 'bar sa bon te/ /dpal gyi be'u bkra shis
126a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /dga' ba 'khyil pa 'dzin pa ni/ /lag pas nyams su blangs pa las/ /'od 'bar snang ba bde ba po/ /dug chen po ni dngos po'i gnod/ /'dod chags la sogs gcong chen po/ /gco mchog gi ni stong pa nyid/ /zug rdu rtog bcas rlung gnyis gnyis bo/
126a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byin? pa drung bsgom bla na med/ /sman rnams ma lus gnyen po'i tshogs/ /ljon pa'i shir ni d+hu tI rgyas/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong la/ /nad ni thog med des mnar ba'o/ /des na de nyid dgrar che ba'o/ /'jig rten gsum ni sgo gsum ste/ /thig le dkar dmar 'dre
126a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /yungs kar sngom bo'i tshad tsam pa/ /mdzes ni 'bar ba bsgom pa'o/ /dpal ldan bde chen khams yin to/ /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can zhes pa/ /rgyu ba chul? skar ma thig /lus kyi khams rnams bskor ba'o/ /de yang rtsa thig du zhan/ /gtsug tor ba ni
126a6(rgyud 'grel): dpral bcu drug/ nyi shu ba dkan mgrin so gnyis/ /snying gar brgyad de bzhin bcu'o/ /mkhris pa lte ba drug cu bzhi/ /gsang ba bcu drug brgyad cu po/ /rung khams cha mnyam nor bu'i bar/ /bcu drug rig drug nyi shu gnyis/ /rlung mkhris pad kar 'dus pa'o/ /
126a7(rgyud 'grel): ri'i nang na rlung bcu ste/ /rlung la brten pas thig le de/ /de ltar rtsa rlung thig le ??/ /rkang grags sum stong sum brgya dang/ /drug cu thams pa yin par 'dod/ /de nyid ?? ??  dpa' mo ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ /phyogs bcu lus kyi nyid lag la/ /nam
126b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i mthar thug rlung lnga'i bar/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes khams/ /mi 'jig bde ba legs par 'dzugs/ /d+hU tI rgyas pa mchog yin no/ /'grol rtsa rlung byang chub sems/ /gdugs bzhin bde chen 'khor lo la/ /yangs pa mi bzang mdzod yin te/ /bde
126b2(rgyud 'grel): ?? phyir gdug pa shes brjod/ /de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /e baM las ni 'byung ba dang/ /thabs mang myur dang bde ba skyo bo dang/ /'dod chags chen pos rjes chags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyad du 'dod/ /ces gsungs so/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje ni/ /bde chen dkyil
126b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor can bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan rdo rje pad+ma ni/ /kak+ko la zhes rab tu grags/ /gar gyi bdag ni sbyor thabs kyis/ /yan lag drug cu rtsa gnyis te/ /de yang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs yin/ /khyab bdag chen po thig le la/ /rin chen gdugs ni nor bu'i rtser/ /
126b4(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs thams cad bsil ba'o/ /gtum mo che las skyes pa yi/ /ye shes de la rab tu 'jug/ de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi lam/ /mchog tu gyur pas rgyal po che/ /lam des sangs rgyas kun gyi sku/ /'bras bur 'char ba nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kun
126b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi lam 'bras la/ /sbyor bar byed pas rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa ni/ /bslar gsum yin la de 'dil/ /ldan pas lhan skyes bstan pa gcig 'di ni dang po'i dbang bskur te/ /rdo rje mdza' yas 'du shes dag /rin chen nyi mtshor ba dag/
126b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur dpal ni don yod grub/ /'du byed rnam dag kun bdag ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs phung dag /dbang phyug ste ni mi bskyod pa/ /rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'o/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs kun gyi bdag /de ltar bsgrub
126b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang bcu thob/ /rdo rje 'chang brgyud gsum gyi/ /mchog gam kun gyi rje bo'o/ /de yang gnas rdzas dag dbang dang/ /yon tan sgrub pa rnams sbyor/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu che ba/ /zhes pa snod du gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur bas/ /skye ba
127a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /ces ba 'di yi don bshad na/ /bum pas bskyed rims legs gnas khyod/ /khyod ni 'gro drug gar ma yin/ /'di yang kun brtags des na lha/ /bla ma'i drin las rnyed pa yi/ /ci phyir
127a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gces spras min/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /rjes su 'dzin cing skyod ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /dbang dang rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs/ /lus kyi 'phri las slob dpon che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /zhes pas gsang
127a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang yin te/ /bla ma yab yum gnyis med las/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon sprul la/ /rdo rje nyi ma mdza' yas la/ /de yi bde ba snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba mi bskyod ba/ /ye shes 'phro 'du dri med 'od/ /bu yi lce la sbyin par bya/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa
127a4(rgyud 'grel): cheT/ /zhes pa gsum pa'i dbang yin te/ /dge slong rdo rje rnams la/ /chags bral bla mas mtshon bar bya/ /de ltar min na bla mnyams/ /slob ma shin tu 'dod na yang/ /so sor thar pa spangs bar bya/ /lam 'di lam mchog thub chen gsungs/ /gang zag rnams la dge
127a5(rgyud 'grel): slong mcho/ /longs sbyor gnas bsngams nam mkha' mthong/ /kha dog gnyis med lhan cig skyes/ /chags pa chen ni bu de la/ /de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las/ /yigs ldan lo ni bcu drug ma/ /lang tsho sogs kyis nga rgyan pa la/ /dang po legs par bslab bya ste/ /'bral ba
127a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gnas la dgod/ /sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de yi cho ga yang gsungs pa/ /dang po gso sbyor sbyin par bya/ /de nas bslab pa'i gnas bcu sbyin/ /de nas bye brag mdo sde bstan/ /de nas dbu ma'i tshul lugs sbyin/ /de rjes dus
127a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo sbyin/ /zhes gsungs pas/ /ka ra na yi bstan bcos kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yang rnam pa lnga/ /bzad mo cod pan dung can dang/ /ri mo can dang glad po can/ /gla rtsi bar rtsa chu dri dang/ /nya dang rnag gi dri yi mtshon/ /phag mo sgrol mgos dkar mo/ /
127b1(rgyud 'grel): ma kI dang spyan ma'i rigs/ /lus ran rked phra rkad lag 'jam/ /lhung phyed rtse ldan phag mo yi/ /cung zad lus phra ring zhing mig/ mi g.yo skra 'khril pad can sgron/ /'dod chen do tsha med rtsod dga' / /thud ba dud can gos dkar mo/ /ring zhing lus rgyas
127b2(rgyud 'grel): skra? srab? dar/ /som? ?? thig le lta bur snang/ /re mo can te mA ma kI/ /sbom thung lus mkhrad shin du sra/ /smra brtson spyan ma glang po ma/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pha yang lnga/ /seng ge ri dags rta glang po/ /mi bskyod don grub rin 'byung dang/ /'od dpag med dang
127b3(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad do/ /dri ni sngon dang 'dra ba la/ /dben gnas 'jig med yul dang bral/ /stong dang sdom brtson mi bskyod rigs/ /myur du 'gro zhing myur du 'dzag/ skrag cing 'jigs pa don grub bo/ /'dod chen gtong phod gzhan don rtson/ /gzhan dbang
127b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dang nyi ma'i rigs/ /dal bu 'gro zhing mig mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin bems po yi yon tan/ /nya dri 'od dpag pad pa'i rigs/ /shin tu rmongs bzang smra ba nyung/ /rnag dri rnam par snang mdzad rigs/ /dri med 'ong las de skad gsungs/ /kha dog sna
127b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /shes rab de las byung ba dang/ /rdo rje skyil krur bcas nas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sku bskyed la/ /sangs rgyas yang dag brjod chos ni/ /bum pa'i sbyor ba yan lag lnga/ /'dus byas bsod nams tshogs kun gyis/ /rdo rje 'chad
127b6(rgyud 'grel): gis 'gran med gsungs/ /'dzin pa dbu ma mi rtog ldan/ /dpal ldan ye shes chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma las skyes pa'o/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bskur byas pa yis/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /phyag rgya chen po de rnyed pas/ /rjes la ?? rtog
127b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snang ba ni/ /rgyal po sgyu phrul sna tshogs 'chad/ /zhes ba rdo rje gcod pa las/ /skar ma rab rim mar me dang/ /skya ma zil pa chu bud dang/ /rmi lam glog dang sprin dang ni/ /sgra brnyan mgal me gzugs ?? ltar/ /'dus byas ltar rtogs par
128a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rtogs pa 'phags pa'i gang zag go zhes gsungs so/ /che ba bzhi pa'i ye shes la/ /gsum 'phags sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal/ /rdo rje rnon po bzhi pa de/ /ngal gri che de rtog kun gcod/ /yi ge mchog ste e yin la/ /rnam par
128a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa 'gyur ba med/ /dbang bzhi de yi yon tan ni/ /theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ /de yang mo spong brten pas gcod/ /mtshon cha chen po de nyid la/ /rdo rje chos shes grags pa yin/ /rdo rje zab mo skye med la/ /rgyal ba de rtogs 'jig rten 'das/ /las
128a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dgra bcom zil mnan pa'o/ /don ni dbang bzhi'i don rnams la/ /rig ni de nyid lam mchog rtogs/ /de nyid rdo rje blo gros la/ /yon tan 'di rnams bshad bzhin thob/ /pha rol phyin ba kun ni bcu/ /rdzogs pa dbang bzhi la ldan pa/ /sa rnams
128a4(rgyud 'grel): kun nis bcu la/ /rgyan dang ldan ni dbang re zhing/ /dang pos dang po gnyis pas bzhi/ /gsum pas bzhi dang bzhi pas gcig/ de yang gsang ba mdzod las gsungs/ /rab tu dga' ba chu yi dbang/ /gsang ba dri med 'od 'phro byed/ /shes rab ye shes
128a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyang dka' ste/ /mngon gyur mi g.yo ring song ba/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bas/ /legs pa'i blo bros chos kyi sbrin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rnam par dag pa'i lam de yis/ /bdag med chos nyid rdo rje 'chad/ /yang dag ye shes bde chen po/ /zla
128a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od bzang bo haM las thob/ /brtson chen bum pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgyu 'phrul dra brtsa rlung khyab byung? kun gyi ni rtsa rlung nyid/ /bdag po thig le mchog bde stong/ /rdo rje gdan ni lte ba la/ /ma lus ldan ni rigs drug dang/ /'pho ba chu tshod dbyu gu dang/ /dkyil
128a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lnga ltar ldan ba'o/ /lta stangs yon tan rlung grub dus/ /ye shes sku ni mtshan ma la/ /rnams ni du sogs bco lnga la/ /ma lus 'chad ni ra khA mthong/ /blo gros bzang po rtog dpyod pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes can/ /kun du bzang po mnyam
128b1(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid phyag rgya chen po lhun gyis grub/ /sa ni sa sogs 'byung lnga yi/ /snying bo ye shes rlung grub ba'o/ /'gro ba 'dzin ni 'gyur ba 'gags/ /sangs rgyas kun ni gshegs pa'i lam/ /snying bo chen po d+hU tIr zhugs/ /dus sbyor la sogs bcu gnyis
128b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rim gyi rim gyis rnam dag pas/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo brgya la sogs/ /yon tan sna tshogs 'chad ba po/ /rgyas par dri ma med par blta/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ mi 'gyur 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings/ /dngos po kun gyis rang bzhin
128b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ //skye med rtogs pa'i lta ba 'dzin/ /skye mod chos te don dam pa/ /sna tshogs don ni kun rdzob la/ /chos kun theg pa sna tshogs la/ /ngo bo nyid ni mthar thugs pa/ /'chad ni bde stong dran pas skyod/ /shes rab chen
128b4(rgyud 'grel): po stong pa nyid/ /skad cig tshe gcig 'jam dpal mthong/ /chos dang 'khor dbu mya ngan 'das/ /khong du chud pa ro gcig 'chad/ /chos kun khams gsum rtogs pa gsum/ /rdul mun snying stobs bde chen du/ /mngon par rtogs pa mchog yin te/ /
128b5(rgyud 'grel): thub pa mi 'dzag blo mchog ni/ /rnam grol bde stong 'byung po sel/ /mi g.yo rlung lang yis ni/ /rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid can/ /thig le bde bas brgyan pa la/ /spro dga' gnas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de lta'i rang bzhin byang chub 'chang/ /sangs rgyas
128b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi ye shes de/ /rnal 'byor ba yi mngon sum pa/ /gnyen po ye shes me lce can/ /d+hU tIr 'od 'bar gsal bas thob/ /gnas pa lus la 'khor lo drug /'byung ba phung po rnam pa lnga/ /yon tan drug dang mdza' drug dang/ /las kyi dbang drug byad
128b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang drug/ zhi gnas lhag mthong rnam pa gnyis/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag pa yis/ /chags bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rgya cher 'grel pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //dgu pa rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /mnyam nyid
129a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes le'u ston/ /'dod pa mchog gi ye shes la/ /don grub de ni bde bas thob/ /dam pa ste ni rtsol ba med/ /ngan song dgu ni dug gsum la/ /thams cad nyon mongs brgyad khri stong/ /rnam par sbyod ba ma rig pa/ /lhan skyes ye shes chen
129a2(rgyud 'grel): po rtogs/ /mgon po rdo rje theg pa 'di/ /sems can kun gyi lam mchog go /sems can thams cad ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya chen por rab sgrol byed/ /'khrul pa'i snang ba nyon mongs g.yul/ /stong nyid gcig pus 'joms pas dpa' / /mi shes bden 'dzin
129a3(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed rnams/ /de nyid dgra ste dregs pa 'joms/ /'joms pas dpal ldan nyid yin la/ /blo ldan chos ldan chos de yis/ /sgeg pa 'chang ba ye shes ldan/ /brtan po gtsug tor thig le bstan/ /mi sdug stong pa shes rab la/ /gzugs
129a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba ni bde stong ldan/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon rlung gnyis so/ /brgya phrag kun ni nyi khri dang/ /tshig stong drug brgya'i grangs yin la/ /bskyod cing zhes pa rnam shes rta/ /'phags pa klu sgrub zhal snga nas/ /sems can kun gyi srog gyur pa/ /rlung zhes bya ba las
129a5(rgyud 'grel): kun byed/ /lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can/ /'di ni shes rab bzhon pa'o/ /rtsa lam d+hU tIr 'jug pa ste/ /goms pa'i stobs kyis gar byed cing/ /zhes pa pa ma hi 'du sogs/ /skar ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /dpa' ldan d+hU tI lag pa gnyis/ /brgyas gang la
